imdb.title: Kaiko sareta Ankoku Heishi (30-dai) no Slow na Second Life
imdb.plot: A hero's son, Dariel, was kidnapped and raised by his demon lord enemy to be his subordinate. But when Dariel is thrown out, he must find his own way to his own place in the world.

episodes.title: Dariel Gets Fired
episodes.plot: Dariel is dismissed from the demon army and wanders the earth. But when he saves a young girl, she brings him to her village in gratitude.

episodes.title: Dariel Works His First Assignment as an Adventurer
episodes.plot: Dariel goes on his first job as an adventurer: picking herbs with Marika. Later, he encounters serious danger in fighting a wild beast.

episodes.title: Dariel Goes to His Old Workplace
episodes.plot: Dariel investigates a closed-off mine, and reunites with old comrades.

episodes.title: Dariel Negotiates
episodes.plot: When a rival guild tries to take the now-prosperous mine for themselves, Dariel steps in to negotiate a compromise.

episodes.title: Dariel Fights in a Duel.
episodes.plot: A blacksmith comes to the mines to forge a masterpiece weapon, which only Dariel can wield.

episodes.title: Dariel, Enveloped by Steam
episodes.plot: Dariel is faced with a job offer and later on is confronted by a naked Marika in a sauna. Which is the better option for him?

episodes.title: Dariel Uses That One Skill
episodes.plot: A happily settled Dariel meets a Hero and her party, who after seeing Dariel's fighting prowess, tries to recruit him to fight demons.
